official_title: Phase 2 Single-Arm, Open Label Study Of Irinotecan In Combination With Temozolomide In Children With Recurrent Or Refractory Medulloblastoma And In Children With Newly Diagnosed High-Grade Glioma.

criteria.raw_text:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Cohort 1: Recurrent or refractory medulloblastoma in which current standard treatment approaches have failed; biopsy is not required for recurrent disease.
* Cohort 2: Newly-diagnosed high-grade glioma (World Health Organization \[WHO\] grade 3 or 4)
* Life expectancy ≥ 3 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of brainstem glioma
* Concurrent administration of any other anti-tumor therapy
* Pre-existing uncontrolled diarrhea

sex: ALL

minimumAge: 6 Months

maximumAge: 18 Years

stdAges: ['CHILD', 'ADULT']
